author: matthiasksieber
title: Revenue Share Token Smart Contract
description: There are currently no open source smart contracts for Revenue Share Tokens applications, which could be used by many different platforms.
solution: To build an open source smart contract for revenue sharing for Cardano DApps.
experience: Loxe Inc. team, experienced and hackathon winning group of Plutus developers, participants of Gimbalabs PPBL, and experienced web developers
